contentrichtext.text: {{MedalTop}} {{MedalSport | Women's [[Athletics at the Summer Olympics|athletics]]}} {{MedalCountry | the {{NED}} }} {{MedalGold| [[1948 Summer Olympics|1948 London]] | [[Athletics at the 1948 Summer Olympics – Women's 4 × 100 metres relay|4x100 metre relay]]}} {{MedalBottom}} '''Gerda Johanna Marie van der Kade-Koudijs''' (born {{birth date and age|1923|10|29}}) is a former [[Netherlands|Dutch]] [[athletics (sport)|athlete]]. Born Gerda Koudijs in [[Rotterdam]], her greatest success was winning the [[gold medal]] in the 4 x 100 m [[relay race|relay]] at the [[1948 Summer Olympics]], together with [[Xenia Stad-de Jong]], [[Netty Witziers-Timmer]], and [[Fanny Blankers-Koen]].<ref>[http://www.databaseolympics.com/players/playerpage.htm?ilkid=VANDEGER01 databaseolympics.com]</ref> Two years earlier, she had already won the same event at the [[1946 European Championships in Athletics|1946 European Championships]], her second title after winning the [[long jump]]. At the London Olympics, Van der Kade-Koudijs also took part in the long jump, in which she missed out on a [[bronze medal]] by half a centimeter, and the 80 m [[hurdling|hurdles]], in which she was eliminated in the semi-finals. ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Footer Olympic Champions 4x100 m Women}} {{Footer European Champions Long Jump Women}} {{Footer European Champions 4x100 m Women}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Kade-Koudijs, Gerda van der | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Dutch athlete | DATE OF BIRTH = 1923-10-29 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Kade-Koudijs, Gerda van der}} [[Category:1923 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Dutch sprinters]] [[Category:Dutch hurdlers]] [[Category:Dutch long jumpers]] [[Category:Olympic athletes of the Netherlands]] [[Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Netherlands]] [[Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1948 Summer Olympics]] [[Category:Sportspeople from Rotterdam]] [[Category:Olympic medalists in athletics (track and field)]] [[Category:European Athletics Championships medalists]] {{Netherlands-athletics-bio-stub}}
